dt: {bc}to bring about or carry out (something, such as a crime or deception) {bc}{sx|commit||}
{bc}to produce, perform, or execute (something likened to a crime)

et: Latin {it}perpetratus{/it}, past participle of {it}perpetrare{/it}, from {it}per-{/it} through + {it}patrare{/it} to accomplish, from {it}pater{/it} father {ma}{mat|father|}{/ma}
shortdef: to bring about or carry out (something, such as a crime or deception) : commit
to produce, perform, or execute (something likened to a crime)
